pullrequest.title: Merge chunks from all genomedata archives for window selection

content.html:
@mmendez12 Could you clarify the issue specifically? Is it the error message? Is it not specific enough?

If for some reason there are handles opened, the file descriptors will be released back to the OS when the process terminates. Normally CPython will "close" the handles automatically (which I agree should not be relied upon) but in this case, it's largely irrelevant since we're reading the files and we're not buffering any data for a write.

As far as I can tell this won't "break" Segway since if an exception did occur while attempting to open the archives, the exception should remain uncaught and cause Segway to terminate.
